0.0: She ceased to argue with her: From here we learn that we do not overburden [the prospective convert] nor are we overly meticulous with him.
0.1: 1 And the two of them walked on: Said Rabbi Abbahu: Come and see how beloved converts are before the Holy Blessing One: Since she decided to convert, the Tanakh equates Ruth with Naomi [who is considered righteous].

1: A relative, the son of the brother of Elimelech he was.  Our teaches of blessed memory said "Elimelech, and Shalmon the father of Boaz, and Ploni Almoni the redeemer, and the father of Naomi, were all the children of Nachshon son of Aminodov and the merit of the fathers did not benefit them when they the Land for outside the Land."
